function.name: Ok To Sleep
function.description: This function is called by the Idle/Sleep plugin before sleeping. The application should return TRUE if the device may sleep or FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: durationMs
arg.description: The maximum duration in milliseconds that the device will sleep.

function.name: Wake Up
function.description: This function is called by the Idle/Sleep plugin after sleeping.

arg.name: durationMs
arg.description: The duration in milliseconds that the device slept.

function.name: Ok To Idle
function.description: This function is called by the Idle/Sleep plugin before idling. The application should return TRUE if the device may idle or FALSE otherwise.

function.name: Active
function.description: This function is called by the Idle/Sleep plugin after idling.
